attributes.action: Cancel 2022 GCSE exams due to prolonged and signifcant disruption.
attributes.additional_details: In light of the significant and prolonged disruption to education, the Government need to cancel GCSE exams for the 2022 cohort and use teacher assessments to ensure the system is fair for all.
attributes.background: The current Y10 cohort have had considerable and prolonged disruption to their education over a two year period. Both GCSE courses and KS3 learning have been severely disrupted making exams very unfair.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Cancel A-level and GCSE exams 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760

Reduce content for 2022 A-level and GCSE exams: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803

Review 2022 exam arrangements for GCSEs and A-levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569
